title: net/rpc: Server.Register: Inconsistent documentation
body:
by **rajenderreddykompally**: 
http://tip.golang.org/pkg/net/rpc/#Server.Register doc comment says methods must have 
two arguments, BOTH pointers to exported structs.

But code (http://tip.golang.org/src/pkg/net/rpc/server.go?s=7038:7092#L303) and package
comment (http://tip.golang.org/pkg/net/rpc/#pkg-overview) seems to suggest ONLY second
parameter of the method must be a pointer.
